subject: Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
Attn: Beneficiary .
RE; YOUR FUND DELIVERY $10.5M USD .
This is to inform you that plans have been concluded for our agent to deliver your
long awaited fund to you . My office decided to us this procedure because we
found out that every effort you made previously for your fund to be transferred
did not work out.
We decided to deliver your fund directly to you to avoid any stories from
bank or any organization .
To proceed you need to send the following details so our delivery agent
can quickly contact you once he arrives at your location.
DETAILS NEEDED .
1) Your complete and sex
2) Your current address
3) Your direct mobile number
4) The nearest airport to you
5) Your passport or Driver's License .
Waiting for your urgent reply so we can proceed .
Thank you.
Michael Goodrich.
IMF HEAD OFFICE LONDON ENGLAND .

subject: Re:    Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
Hello Michael Goodrich,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about the delivery of my long-awaited fund. I appreciate the effort your office has made to ensure this process is successful.

I'm curious, though, could you please provide more details about this fund? For instance, how was it accrued and why has it been designated for me? Also, could you explain a bit more about the delivery process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Monica

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
Attn: Monica .

Thanks for your response about your long awaited fund . Well to answer your
question the fund we are talking about is your covid-19 American Government
Intervention Fund. During the covid-19 intervention fund was made
available but we later found out that its not everybody that was able to
access it that's why we are reaching out now to individuals and
organizations .

So the process of delivery is that we would send our agent who will deliver
the fund to you in your location .So all you need to do now is to provide
us with your address . Age and occupation . Passport . Direct mobile number
.

Once we receives the needed details our agent will proceed and deliver the
fund to you .


Thank you .

Mr M Goodrich

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
Hello Mr. Goodrich,

Thank you for your quick response and the detailed explanation about the fund. It's really interesting to know that such a fund exists and I'm being considered for it.

Could you please tell me more about how this fund was made available? And why was it not accessible to everyone initially? Also, I'm curious about the role of your agent in this process. How will they ensure the safe delivery of the fund?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Monica

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
The fund was made available to everyone one to alleviate the effects covid
- 19 pandemic had on individuals and business owners . Emails were
randomly selected and you fall in this category.

Our agent will deliver directly to your location .

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary .
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that sounds like a wonderful initiative! It's great to hear about efforts being made to help people during these challenging times. Could you please tell me more about how this fund works? How was it established and who are the people behind it? 

Also, I'm curious about the selection process. How were the emails chosen randomly? And what criteria was used to determine who falls into this category?

I'm looking forward to hearing more about this. Thanks for reaching out!

Best wishes,
Monica
